sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Home Depot topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 19.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike, trading down 1.4%.
Nike is showing a gain of 4.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Pfizer, trading down 1.2%, and Johnson & Johnson, trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
